categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: Engagement in the asteroid-hives of Gelpog the Tyrant

A conflict between the Jedi Order and the forces of Gelpog the Tyrant occurred during the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The engagement was fought in Gelpog's asteroid-hives and was participated in by at least one of the apprentices of Jedi Master Ngani Zho—Satele Shan, Syo Bakarn, Jaric Kaedan, and Bela Kiwiiks.

The battle in the asteroid-hives of Gelpog the Tyrant was first mentioned in The Lost Suns, Part 1—the first entry in the Lost Suns comic story arc. The Lost Suns was written by Alexander Freed and released in 2011.
